    • Uses of TelegramBot in com.jtelegram.api

      Methods in com.jtelegram.api that return types with arguments of type TelegramBot 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Set<TelegramBot> TelegramBotRegistry.getBots() 
      Method parameters in com.jtelegram.api with type arguments of type TelegramBot 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void TelegramBotRegistry.registerBot(String apiKey, BiConsumer<TelegramBot,TelegramException> callback)
      Registers the bot and makes a request to telegram to verify the apiKey is correct This action will be performed on the bot's dedicated request queue, and thus a callback must be used.
